scripts.build:infrastructure: ng build narik-infrastructure && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/infrastructure
scripts.build:custom-validators: ng build narik-custom-validators && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/custom-validators
scripts.build:common: ng build narik-common && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/common
scripts.build:core: ng build narik-core && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/core
scripts.build:ui-core: ng build narik-ui-core && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/ui-core
scripts.build:app-core: ng build narik-app-core && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/app-core
scripts.build:ui-ng-bootstrap: ng build narik-ui-ng-bootstrap && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/ui-ng-bootstrap && node build-tools/copy.js projects/narik-ui-ng-bootstrap/src/styles/* dist/ui-ng-bootstrap/styles
scripts.build:ui-swimlane: ng build narik-ui-swimlane && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/ui-swimlane && node build-tools/copy.js projects/narik-ui-swimlane/src/styles/* dist/ui-swimlane/styles
scripts.build:ui-ngx-bootstrap: ng build narik-ui-ngx-bootstrap && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/ui-ngx-bootstrap
scripts.build:ui-material: ng build narik-ui-material && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/ui-material && node build-tools/copy.js projects/narik-ui-material/src/styles/* dist/ui-material/styles
scripts.build:ui-devextreme: ng build narik-ui-devextreme && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/ui-devextreme && node build-tools/copy.js projects/narik-ui-devextreme/src/styles/* dist/ui-devextreme/styles
scripts.build:ui-primeng: ng build narik-ui-primeng && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/ui-primeng && node build-tools/copy.js projects/narik-ui-primeng/src/styles/* dist/ui-primeng/styles
scripts.build:ui-nebular: ng build narik-ui-nebular && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/ui-nebular && node build-tools/copy.js projects/narik-ui-nebular/src/styles/* dist/ui-nebular/styles
scripts.build:cli: ng build narik-cli && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/narik
scripts.build:jwt: ng build narik-jwt-authentication && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/jwt-authentication
scripts.build:signalr: ng build narik-signalr-client && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/signalr-client
scripts.build:client-storage: ng build narik-client-storage && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/client-storage
scripts.build:firebase: ng build narik-firebase && node build-tools/copy.js readme.md dist/firebase
scripts.build: npm run build:infrastructure && npm run build:custom-validators && npm run build:common && npm run build:core  && npm run build:ui-core &&    npm run build:app-core && npm run build:ui-material && npm run build:ui-ng-bootstrap && npm run build:ui-ngx-bootstrap && npm run build:ui-devextreme  && npm run build:ui-nebular && npm run build:ui-primeng && npm run build:ui-swimlane && npm run build:jwt && npm run build:client-storage && npm run build:signalr && npm run build:firebase &&  npm run build:cli
